mapper.sql: message_id, message_content, title, H5_url, send_status, send_type, bespeak_send_time, background_image_url, message_describe, type, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.insert: insert into message (message_id, message_content, title, H5_url, send_status, send_type, bespeak_send_time, background_image_url, message_describe, type, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark) values (#{messageId}, #{messageContent}, #{title}, #{h5Url}, #{sendStatus}, #{sendType}, #{bespeakSendTime}, #{backgroundImageUrl}, #{messageDescribe}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{createMan}, #{modifyMan}, #{remark})

insert into message (message_id, message_content, title, H5_url, send_status, send_type, bespeak_send_time, background_image_url, message_describe, type, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark) values
(#{item.messageId}, #{item.messageContent}, #{item.title},#{item.h5Url}, #{item.sendStatus}, #{item.sendType} ,#{item.bespeakSendTime}, #{item.backgroundImageUrl},#{item.messageDescribe}, #{item.type}, #{item.createTime} ,#{item.modifyTime}, #{item.createMan}, #{item.modifyMan}, #{item.remark)
mapper.update:
update message
message_content = #{messageContent},
title = #{title},
H5_url = #{h5Url},
send_status = #{sendStatus},
send_type = #{sendType},
bespeak_send_time = #{bespeakSendTime},
background_image_url = #{backgroundImageUrl},
message_describe = #{messageDescribe},
type = #{type},
create_time = #{createTime},
modify_time = #{modifyTime},
create_man = #{createMan},
modify_man = #{modifyMan},
remark = #{remark},
where message_id = #{messageId}
